originalPostTitle: Nodejs: All You Need to Know with Practical Project

commentText: I recently completed the MERN Stack course by Jahid Haron, and it was an excellent learning experience. His teaching style is clear and practical, making even complex topics easy to understand. The hands-on projects gave me real confidence to build applications. Jahid Sir is also very supportive and motivating throughout the course.
originalPostTitle: MERN Stack: All You Need to Know with Practical Project

commentText: The lessons are clear, beginner-friendly, and up-to-date with modern React practices like hooks and functional components. The practical project ties everything together, making it easy to apply what you learn.
